divs: sighting detailsthis is no joke. so let me start. back in 2007 in the last week of april on a wednesday at about 9:30pm i saw a ufo over antioch california it was a row of lights in a ���v��� formation. it flew vary slowly and was between 15 to 10 thousand feet hi but was defiantly on the horizon. since then i���ve tracked several unexplained things in the night sky. two bright light traveling east, glowing objects in orbit. but all were possible experimental aircraft, and being a sentence nerd\ good american, i would never report it. however, i could no longer hold it in any longer. it���s been seen allover the u.s. lately, and i am tired of it. this year on 01\01\2008 at 12:00am i was outside with my household,in antioch, friends and nabobs. where we saw the red\organ lights in the sky, at first i thought they were signal flairs because it was new years eve and it sounded like a war zone outside. they started in a start line and then moved there was about six of them they formed a fimular shape the big dipper. they started then to move in a vertical line one above the other. one went left and then came back now the row was not horizontal it was vertical. now the strange part they merged with each other yes six lights became one and then simply disappeared. while this was going on a privet plane was in the sky i wonder if they saw it to. thank god iam ont the only one who saw it.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Antioch
